title: Senior Microservices Developer (Consultant via Tech Systems) - Industrial Real Estate Asset Management

responsibilities.responsibilty: Creation of Angular 12 Components to provide a responsive user interface experiences in differing apps.
Created C# Azure Functions (Subscriber/publisher) to facilitate data integration and transfer between components.

Managed software utilizing C#, Angular, TypeScript, and .Net Core, following an Entity Framework code-first methodology.
